trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Santa Clara
There were no other sightings in Santa Clara on or around June 21st 2009
Summary: Bright flashing star-like light and moving W to E and 5 cigar like moving S to N.
divs: Sighting DetailsSunday June 21, 2009 I was out in my backyard when I looked up in the sky and say a flashing light as bright and large as Venus moving slowly from the west to the east at approximately 10,000ft. The light would flash very brightly silvery-white as large as Venus then flash as a pinpoint then back again. As I was watching this, 5 small cigar shaped objects caught my eye moving from the south to the north. As I watched these objects which were approximately at 8,000ft, 3 were together and 2 were in front and slightly to the side with all 5 moving faster then a jet airliner. The 3 objects were moving in a counter clockwise motion as they were moving forward. They objects then disapeared. I looked back at the large silvery-white light for a few more seconds and it to just disapeared. The sighting lasted for about 1 minute.This was in Santa Clara, California about 12 noon.
